name: Spec Ops 2: US Army Green Berets
name_original: Spec Ops 2: US Army Green Berets
description:
Spec Ops 2: US Army Green Berets is an action-shooter game developed by Zombie Studios. It came out on 01-01-1999. Ripcord Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Spec Ops 2: US Army Green Berets is available on PC.
